text: Michel Fernex (2 April 1929 â€“ 2 October 2021) was a Swiss medical doctor. He worked at the Medical Faculty University of Basel. He was a member of Physicians for Social Responsibility and International Physicians for the Prevention of Nuclear War. Fernex died on 2 October 2021 in Basel at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swiss physicians Category:Scientists from Basel Category:Academics of the University of Basel
title: Michel Fernex
